channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Maduro tests Trump with "Plan B" oil tanker strategy
item.description: Venezuela is testing President Trump 's blockade of sanctioned oil tankers by letting two crude-laden vessels motor out from the South American nation...

item.title: U.S. conducts strikes on ISIS targets in Syria in retaliation for killing of American soldiers
item.description: The U.S. military conducted air strikes on Friday against dozens of ISIS targets in Syria in retaliation for the attack that killed three U.S. soldier...

item.title: U.S. boards un-sanctioned tanker with Venezuelan oil to tighten blockade
item.description: The U.S. military early Saturday boarded a tanker that is not under U.S. sanctions as it shipped Venezuelan oil in hopes of escaping a blockade impose...

item.title: Influencers play detective — and unleash chaos
item.description: As police scoured New England this week for the gunman who killed two people at Brown University , a parallel manhunt erupted online, falsely targetin...

item.title: Republican women shrinking their ranks in Congress
item.description: Retirements, resignations and tough elections could cut into their growing numbers from recent elections.

item.title: U.S. strikes dozens of sites in Syria in retaliation for troops’ deaths
item.description: The expansive operation follows the killing last weekend of two U.S. soldiers and their interpreter at a military base in the city of Palmyra.

item.title: Government’s historic role as trusted information source is under threat
item.description: The U.S. government for decades has been the world’s leading provider of reliable data. Many researchers wonder if that is still the case.

item.title: What’s in Epstein files so far? Celebrities, Clinton, few Trump mentions
item.description: The Justice Department has not indicated when more files will be released, and its site no longer contains some files that had already been posted.

item.title: Lou Cannon, Post reporter and preeminent Reagan biographer, dies at 92
item.description: His books on Reagan “have never been transcended,” said presidential historian Douglas Brinkley.

item.title: Epstein files include thousands of new images, audio, records and videos
item.description: The Justice Department released thousands of files on convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein on Friday, which includes documents, recordings of phone ...

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino
item.description: President Donald Trump will give a speech in Northeastern Pennsylvania on Tuesday, the first stop in a ‘tour’ where he will talk about affordability c...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
